alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 10 at 11:59AM EDT until September 12 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Around the times of high tide, with very little relief at low tide. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is possible. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels have peaked, but improvements will take a couple of days.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
